alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 27 at 3:19AM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ..Critical Fire weather conditions possible Tuesday afternoon... .Gusty winds and low relative humidity Tuesday afternoon can lead to fires spreading out of control. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061, 074, 075, 084, AND 085... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton, Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Fires can quickly spread out of control even for experienced firefighters.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
